story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0101_0100_1:
I’m the best-possible teammate that Elesa
could choose!
story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0101_0200_1:
Why, you ask? It’s because of my outfit! 
Look at it! Perfect contrast of black and white,
just like a Zebstrika! This must be fate!
story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0101_0300_1:
What’re you on about, sister?
Take a look at me: white sleeves and black pants!
I’m way more Zebstrika than you!
story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0101_0400_1:
You cannot be serious! You have a Liepard on the
back of your jacket, and you dare say you’re more
inspired by Zebstrika than me?!
story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0101_0500_1:
And you! Look at yourselves! You’re not even
wearing Zebstrika colors! What’s the matter
with you?
story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0501_0100_1:
Are you telling me it takes more than wearing
the right colors to be on Elesa’s team?
story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0501_0200_1:
What the heck is more important than wearing
the right colors?!
story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0501_0300_1: I don’t get it... Somebody, tell us the answer!
story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0101_0100_1: We climbed so high up, but we still can’t see her...
story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0101_0200_1: If we could get a good look at this fashion guru...
story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0101_0300_1:
Wait...is that her? I think that’s...
Move! I can’t see!
story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0501_0100_1:
No! You’ve got it all wrong! This isn’t what it
looks like! We can explain!
story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0501_0200_1:
We have no confidence in our fashion sense,
so we thought if we could learn from somebody
fashionable like you...
story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0501_0300_1:
Oh, is that so? Hmm... Then, the best advice I can
give you is to hold your heads high and don’t be
so embarrassed about how you look. Own it.
